name: Hidde de Smet
bio: Hidde de Smet is a solutions architect and cloud consultant passionate about platform engineering and cloud-native technologies. With extensive experience in helping organizations modernize their infrastructure, Hidde shares insights and stories from the field about real-world challenges and solutions in modern software development.

name: Jordan Martinez
bio: Jordan brings 10+ years of DevOps and site reliability engineering experience to the show. As a Senior Engineering Manager, Jordan has led teams through complex cloud migrations and built resilient, scalable systems for Fortune 500 companies. Jordan is passionate about automation, observability, and creating great developer experiences. Outside of tech, Jordan is an avid rock climber and coffee enthusiast.
